description:
As you are lying down, unable to move...your sexy hot youthful wife, Victoria, reveals some very hard truths to you -
1. You are not sexy to her... just sweet.
2. She has been cheating on you with a new boyfriend.
3. She spoke to your doctors... If you Cum you will pass away.
4. She really likes your money... and she is very happy about your life insurance policy in her name.
5. She is going to ensure you are not going to survive one more day on earth.
She is sensually rubbing your cock ss she informs you of all these hard truths. Her speech is sexy even as she tells you of our impending demise. As your end is nearing, she fucks with you by bringing you to the edge and then denying you over and over again. In the end, you are so happy for the orgasmic release, you forget what it means... Then you know nothing any longer.
title: SENSUALLY SENDING YOU AWAY FROM YOUR LIFE
